Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: I had the cheese naan, Lamd Jal Ferezi and a Mango lassi. The food was very tastefull, there was very nice Indian music playing, but it a bit too loud. It took a while to get our food.

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Today we were craving a delicious Indian meal, so we made a Goa dahl curry from South India.  We didn't have time to make naan bread, so we went to our favorite Indian restaurant, Indian Dinner on Surinameplein. Unfortunately they were …

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: We went here for a voucher. Restaurant is nicely said very basic. Service very slow. That’s why I give 2 stars less. However the food is really amazing. I wouldn’t come again this but order on thuisbezorg :)

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: The food is good, staff is friendly but not very fast. Music can be very loud and inappropriate. Probably better to take away.

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Best Indian I’ve had in Amsterdam! Actually best Indian food I’ve hand since I can remember! Great service too!

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Seriously the best Indian restaurant in Amsterdam! I tried many dishes from this place recently, and they keep impressing me. Add to that decent portion, good price and fast delivery. …

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: the delivery guy left the food on the ground in front of me as a reaction for making him wait what must have been less than a minute.He should be happy im leaving a 1 star review,i should have been kicking his teeth in for such a blatant act of disrespect and disregard to hygiene

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Great Indian food spot in the Baarsjes neighborhood. Ideally order ahead as food is made to order. Delivery is not always available but take away is a great alternative. The staff is from India and the food tastes the part. Prices are ok and combo meals are great deals for groups

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Really nice food. We ordered mix veg and it was accurately spiced. Very perfect for a homely dinner. Good work ! Also the delivery time was not much.

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Hands down best Indian restaurant offering delivery in Amsterdam! I've eaten here numerous times since moving to the city last year, and it's been good every time. Very nice staff as well!

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Best paneer and garlic naan I've ever eaten! Huge amounts when take away, always friendly stuff there, totally recommend! ♥️

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: We came in here with a Groupon and were pleasantly surprised with how good the food was. Everything was great and the butter chicken was probably the best we have had in Amsterdam. It's sort of a tough location, kind of hidden off the road, …

Review Text:

This is the first time I ever rate a restaurant but this one is worth it!

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Ordered takeaway saag paneer which was flavour less - they must of forgotten the masala and the naans were thick and undercooked. Awful

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Avoid at any cost! Never had people working in the horeca that rude. Delivery guy is agressive and rude and if you call to complain they simply cancelled your order cause they can't follow up what they are doing. I put one star cause I couldn't put zero. Just don't.

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: I was  there together with 3 friends. Had 3 course of menu but the price was very reasonable compared to other places.really Love the restaurant atmosphere and amazing foods Despite one curry was  little more spicy.

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Good regular Indian food. Probably most of the business comes from delivery cause the restaurant was empty. The owner was also super friendly

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Friendly, prompt service. Had some chicken skewers and lamb biryani. Both were very good. Bring cash! Credit card machine doesn't work.

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: Perfect place you can't go wrong. Great food great service.. the best Kheer I have ever eaten.its a perfect place for Indian food. They serve you with heart.  Keep it up.

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: This is very nice restaurant. I was visited Amsterdam with a group. We had our regular dinner in this restaurant. This is very good for indian food, good test as well as low price also.

Name: Indian Dinner
Review Text: IT was the best indian food I ever had. The butter naan was so soft and tasteful. Not like the others I had till now.. now I know from where to order when I crave for Indian foods.

Review Text: Our favorite Indian food for the last 18 months! We only order delivery, but they always arrive in half the time quoted, and have never gotten an order wrong once.
